archimate:TechnologyService.name: SDKs
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/downloads/ Unified SDKs
The Azure Unified SDKs are collections of libraries for .NET, Java, JavaScript, and Python. They’re built on a common core for easy use of Azure services, with a focus on consistency, familiarity, and language idiomaticity.
If you’re starting a new project or migrating existing projects, Microsoft recommends adopting these libraries. If you’re looking for older versions, go to the SDKs tab. Java
Install Unified SDK API reference TypeScript / JavaScript
Install Unified SDK API reference Python
Install Unified SDK API reference .NET
Download Visual Studio 2019 Download Visual Studio 2019 for Mac Install Unified SDK API reference
